source:
%%sql
-- Build PersonnelSubArea_dim table

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.hr_personnel_sub_area_dim (
    PersonnelSubAreaID,
    PersonnelSubAreaCode,
    Description,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
)

SELECT DISTINCT
    Row_Number() over (order by T1.PSubarea, T1.Personnel_Subarea) AS PersonnelSubAreaID,
    T1.PSubarea as PersonnelSubAreaCode,
    T1.Personnel_Subarea AS Description,
    First(T2.SourceSystemID) as SourceSystemID,
    FIRST(to_timestamp(T1.expected_from)) AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo,
    md5(concat(IFNULL(T1.PSubarea,'.'), IFNULL(first(T1.Personnel_Subarea),'.'))) as RowID,
    'Y' as IsActive

FROM odw_standardised_db.vw_saphr_historic T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description AND T2.IsActive = 'Y'
WHERE T1.PSubarea IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY T1.PSubarea, T1.Personnel_Subarea
